column4: I have a Logitech MOMO Racing wheel. It's detected fine, but I don't have any FF in games, and pedals are detected as a combined axis. Is there any special setup I have to do? Maybe muck around with X's joystick module?
I don't know but X's joystick module will not help you here.
I didn't know if maybe there would even be a way to force it to pick up the other axis
what would you like to do with the pedal-axes? you could map it to buttons with X's joystick driver, if that helps
